item.title: Switching terminals in tmux with ALT-numbers
item.description: I'm a big tmux fan, switching from screen a few years ago. Lately, I've been working on ways to switch between terminals faster. Now I'm using the ALT (Option key actually) under OS X to switch between the different terminals. The switching starts with the backtick and goes across the â€¦
item.dc:creator: mr.rcollins
